title: Garner Case Behind Him, Donovan Takes Oath Of Office In Congress
teaser: Ex-Staten Island DA Dan Donovan may be best known for investigating the death of Eric Garner, who died after police put him in a chokehold. But now Donovan is trying to forge a new path in Congress.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
